message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate down to that amount?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is closer to its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $10,000. Can we try $9,000?
